data_safety_page.section_1_header: Data Protection Information according to Art. 13 GDPR
data_safety_page.section_1_text: We appreciate your interest in our website. Protecting your personal data during its processing when visiting our website is very important to us.
data_safety_page.section_2_text: The controller within the meaning of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other national data protection laws as well as other data protection regulations is:
data_safety_page.section_3_header: Collection and Storage of Access Data in Server Log Files
data_safety_page.section_3_text_1: Every time you access our website, your internet browser automatically sends information to the server of our website for technical reasons. This information is temporarily stored in a log file (so-called server log file).
data_safety_page.section_3_text_1_2: The following data is collected without any action on your part and stored until automatic deletion:
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_1: IP address of the requesting computer (anonymized)
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_3: Name and URL of the retrieved file
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_4: Website from which access is made (referrer URL)
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_5: Browser used and, if applicable, the operating system of your computer as well as the name of your access provider
data_safety_page.section_3_text_2: The data listed above is processed by us and/or our hosting provider for the following purposes:
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_6: Ensuring a smooth connection to the website,
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_7: Ensuring comfortable use of our website,
data_safety_page.section_3_bullet_8: Evaluation of system security and stability.
data_safety_page.section_3_text_3: The legal basis for data processing is Art. 6(1) sentence 1 lit. f GDPR. Our legitimate interest follows from the purposes listed above. Under no circumstances do we use the collected data to draw conclusions about your identity.
data_safety_page.section_3_text_3_2: The data is generally stored for a period of 2 months and then automatically deleted. Longer storage only occurs if legally required or necessary for evidence preservation in the event of concrete attacks on our IT systems.
data_safety_page.section_4_header: Your Rights as a Data Subject
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_1: request information about your personal data processed by us in accordance with Art. 15 GDPR.
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_2: request without undue delay the rectification of inaccurate or the completion of your personal data stored by us in accordance with Art. 16 GDPR.
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_3: request the deletion of your personal data stored by us in accordance with Art. 17 GDPR.
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_4: request the restriction of processing your personal data in accordance with Art. 18 GDPR.
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_5: object to the processing of your personal data based on legitimate interests pursuant to Art. 6(1) sentence 1 lit. f GDPR in accordance with Art. 21 GDPR.
data_safety_page.section_4_bullet_6: lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority pursuant to Art. 77 GDPR. You can usually contact the supervisory authority at your habitual place of residence, workplace, or our company headquarters.
data_safety_page.section_4_text_2: To exercise your rights, you may contact us at any time using the contact details provided above.
data_safety_page.section_5_text: We would like to point out that data transmission over the internet (e.g., communication by email) may have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.
data_safety_page.section_5_text_2: However, we protect our website and other systems with technical and organizational measures against loss, destruction, unauthorized access, modification, or distribution of your data by unauthorized persons.
data_safety_page.section_6_text_1: Our website uses only technically necessary cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device and are required for certain functions of our website.
data_safety_page.section_6_text_2: We use a cookie in particular to store your selected language preference. This cookie ensures that the website is automatically displayed in your preferred language when you visit it again. The cookie does not contain any personal data and serves solely to provide a user-friendly display of our website.
data_safety_page.section_6_text_3: Processing is carried out on the basis of Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR, as we have a legitimate interest in providing our website in a secure and user-friendly manner.
data_safety_page.section_6_text_4: The cookie is stored for a period of 365 days or until it is deleted in the browser settings.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.text_2_1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 para. 1 TMG under general law. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity.
imprint.text_2_2: Our website contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for such external content. The respective provider or operator is always responsible for the content of linked pages.

general.attachments_explanation: Please upload your CV, cover letter, and, if applicable, additional documents as PDF for your application here. (Maximum of 5 files, each not exceeding 5 MB)

home.welcome_header: Strong in civil engineering and cable construction – since 1978
home.welcome_text_1: From civil engineering and cable installation to fiber optic projects:
home.welcome_text_2: We create the technical foundation for digital and urban development. With experience, modern technology, and strong team spirit, we deliver projects precisely, reliably, and sustainably – for secure networks, strong connections, and future-proof infrastructure.
home.values_text: People are at the heart of everything we do – whether customers, partners, or colleagues. Together, we build sustainable infrastructure you can rely on. These values guide our daily actions:
home.values_quality_text: We work with the highest level of care and according to state-of-the-art standards – because in construction, what matters is what lasts.
home.values_reliability_text: Our customers can rely on us: we keep our promises. Deadlines and quality are always our top priorities.
home.values_safety_text: Safe working conditions are our highest priority – for our employees and partners. Our teams regularly take part in training and professional development to stay up to date with the latest safety standards and regulations.
home.values_team_spirit_text: Success is achieved together. We support one another, take action, and always find a solution.
home.values_sustainability_text: We think ahead – conserving resources, acting responsibly toward the environment, and focusing on the future in everything we do.
home.values_development_text: Standing still is not an option. We invest in modern technology and in the training of our team to improve every single day.
home.job_offers_text: With us, you can expect exciting tasks, a motivated team, and the opportunity to grow together. Unlock your potential and help shape the future with us.

services.intro_text: We have been creating connections for over 45 years. Whether energy, telecommunications, or infrastructure: we deliver secure networks, strong connections, and a stable foundation for the future.
services.attribute_1_header: Civil Engineering for Energy Providers and Municipal Utilities
services.attribute_1_text: We carry out civil engineering work for energy providers, telecommunications companies, and municipal utilities. Our services include planning, execution, and surface restoration. We place special emphasis on safety, quality, and orderly construction site management. Our service areas include power, gas, water, and fiber optic routes, house connections, and foundation work.
services.attribute_2_text: Using modern pressing and drilling techniques, we install utility lines beneath roads, sidewalks, and driveways—quickly, precisely, and without open trenches. We use soil displacement rockets with diameters from DA 50 to DA 200, ideal for house connections and crossings. This minimizes disruption to existing surfaces and enables efficient work even in confined spaces.
services.attribute_3_header: Installation and Laying of Cable Systems
services.attribute_3_text: We handle the pulling and installation of cable systems as part of larger civil engineering projects—including power, fiber optic, and data cables. Our teams work closely with network operators and subcontractors to ensure reliable and long-lasting connections.
services.company_fleet_text: Our company fleet is the backbone of our daily operations. With modern machinery and vehicles, we execute civil engineering and cable construction projects precisely, safely, and on schedule. All equipment is regularly maintained and meets the latest technical standards, ensuring reliable performance at all times. Our machinery and vehicle fleet includes, among other things, trucks with gross vehicle weights ranging from 7.5 to 18 tons and mini excavators from 2.5 to 5.5 tons.
services.our_claim_text: We stand for quality, reliability, and efficiency—also when it comes to our fleet. From powerful excavators, wheel loaders, trucks, and Sprinters to cable pulling winches, our equipment enables flexible solutions for every requirement in civil and utility construction.
services.fleet_overview_point_1: <bold>9 Sprinters</bold> – optimally equipped for every operation
services.fleet_overview_point_2: <bold>10 Trucks</bold> – for fast transport and efficient loading and unloading of materials
services.fleet_overview_point_3: <bold>10 Mini Excavators</bold> – for precise earthworks and excavations of all sizes
services.fleet_overview_point_4: <bold>6 Wheel Loaders</bold> – for efficient material logistics on construction sites
services.fleet_overview_point_5: <bold>1 Cable Pulling Winch</bold> – for safe and gentle installation of utility lines
services.fleet_overview_point_6: <bold>5 Low-Bed Trailers</bold> – for the safe transport of construction machinery
services.fleet_overview_point_7: <bold>Soil Displacement Rockets</bold> – for trenchless crossings and house connections
services.numbers_point_2_description: Operational readiness thanks to regular maintenance, modern technology, and a dedicated team
services.numbers_point_3_description: Construction projects successfully completed per year

references.title: Our Clients
references.text: We are proud to have been a reliable partner for energy providers, telecommunications companies, and public sector clients for many years.
references.projects_text: Get insights into projects we have successfully delivered for our partners in the energy and utility networks sector.

about_us.intro_title: Your partner for civil engineering and cable construction since 1978
about_us.intro_text: Since 1978, we have stood for reliable services in civil engineering and cable construction as a family-owned, medium-sized construction company now in its second and third generation. As a capable partner for civil engineering projects with a strong specialization in cable construction, we combine decades of experience with modern technology and a high standard of workmanship. We carry out projects for energy suppliers, telecommunications companies, and public-sector clients – professionally, on schedule, and with a clear commitment to quality. Numerous satisfied customers confirm our reliable cooperation. Cable installation is carried out in accordance with current standards and using all required safety and protective equipment.
about_us.our_team_text: Our team consists of motivated construction professionals from different generations. Together, we deliver projects reliably, safely, and with solid craftsmanship.
about_us.become_part_text: To strengthen our team, we are looking for qualified and reliable employees. We offer secure employment, modern working conditions, and varied projects within the region.
about_us.job_offer_1_text: Transporting construction materials, machinery, and equipment to our construction sites, assisting with loading and unloading, and supporting the civil engineering team while adhering to safety and order regulations.
about_us.job_offer_2_text: Operating modern excavators in cable and civil engineering, performing precise and safe work on utility lines, and maintaining and servicing the machines in close cooperation with the site team.
about_us.job_offer_3_text: Carrying out a wide range of construction and installation work in building and civil engineering, including formwork, concrete, and masonry work, as well as supporting the site team while complying with safety and quality standards.
